TopicTitle: Preserving a fairing shape on a subassembly.

Articles.Content: I have a lander in a fairing aeroshell. I save it as a sub assembly, it works fine, but when i go to put it on my main craft the carefully crafted fairing deletes itself. how can I prevent the fairing from deleting?
join the club. i've got the same question over here:
Use procedural fairings mod? The stock fairings have many and severe problems. I hate part clutter more than you, but they are so bad, I make an exception.
